definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)

sentences.english: What do you say to three shillings.
However, the Silver Shilling was abused as an imitation from that moment on.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，從那一刻起，銀先令就被辱罵是仿造的。

sentences.english: Bust 'em, and you'll bust five-and-thirty shillings.
sentences.chinese: 一繃破就繃掉了三十五個先令。

sentences.english: He thinks the hebolong can win, and gambles five Schillings with me.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲亥伯龍會贏，與我賭五先令。

sentences.english: Hubert grudged paying 20 shillings for a bottle of wine that in not worth 10s .
sentences.chinese: 修伯特不願爲一瓶不值十先令的酒付出二十先令。

sentences.english: Hubert grudged paying 20 shillings for a bottle of wine that in not worth 10s .
sentences.chinese: 修伯特不願爲一瓶不值十先令的酒付出二十先令。

sentences.english: When he received his money he found that five shillings had been knocked off for expenses incurred.
sentences.chinese: 當他收到錢時，他發現已扣去了五先令的費用。

sentences.english: I grudged paying 20s for a bottle of wine that is not worth 10s.
sentences.chinese: 我不願意爲一瓶不值10先令的酒付出20先令。

sentences.english: I grudged paying 20s for a bottle of wine that is not worth 10s.
sentences.chinese: 我不願意爲一瓶不值10先令的酒付出20先令。

sentences.english: This book is five shillings sixpence.
sentences.chinese: 這本書定價五先令六便士。

sentences.english: It is not worth more than 10 shillings.
sentences.chinese: 它的價值不超過十先令。

sentences.english: On the chilly hillside he is unwilling to write his will on the ten-shilling bill.
sentences.chinese: 在寒冷的山坡上他不願意將遺囑寫在十先令帝袼單上。
他回答，“大約48萬肯尼亞先令。”

sentences.english: Uncle, he lent me my first five shillings, which I lost.
sentences.chinese: 叔叔，他借給我5先令，我輸掉了。

sentences.english: You could not getseven shillings into a little pot that size.
sentences.chinese: 你都不可能把7先令放進那麼小的一個罐子裏。

definition: krone (currency of Norway, Denmark, Iceland and Sweden) (loanword)
peso (currency in Latin America) (loanword)/also written 比索[bi3 suo3]
